set.name: Andrena cressonii
set.common_name: Andrena bridwelli Cockerell, 1899; Andrena dubia Robertson, 1902; Andrena (Trachandrena) trumani Viereck and Cockerell, 1914; Opandrena cressonii (Robertson, 1891); Andrena (Opandrena) cressonii Robertson, 1891; Andrena (Opandrena) cressonii transformans Cockerell, 1933; Andrena (Opandrena) cressonii ivanensis Mitchell, 1960; Andrena (Opandrena) cressonii tallahasensis Mitchell, 1960; Andrena (Opandrena) cressonii tallahasseensis Mitchell, 1960, emend.; Andrena kansensis Cockerell, 1899; Andrena latisigna Viereck and Cockerell, 1914; Andrena cressonii kansensis Cockerell, 1899; Andrena (Holandrena) cressonii kansensis Cockerell, 1899; Andrena (Opandrena) cressonii kansensis Cockerell, 1899, valid subspecies; Andrena (Opandrena) cressonii infasciata Lanham, 1949, valid subspecies; Andrena (Holandrena) cressonii infasciata Lanham, 1949; Andrena (Holandrena) cressonii Robertson, 1891
